00036 struct Motor_Struct* Motor_Init(struct Motor_Struct* MS,int pwmChannel,int controlA, int controlB, char Mode){
00037         MS->controlA = controlA;
00038         MS->controlB = controlB;
00039         MS->pwmChannel = pwmChannel;
00040         MS->currPWM = 0;
00041         if(Mode == SELF){
00042                 PWM_InitChannel(pwmChannel,0);          
00043                 GPIO_Init(controlA,OUTPUT);
00044                 GPIO_Init(controlB,OUTPUT);
00045                 MS->Motor_SetPWM = Motor_SetOwnPWM;
00046         } else {
00047                 MS->Motor_SetPWM = Motor_Set2103PWM;
00048         }
00049 
00050         return MS;
00051 }

00063 void Motor_SetPWM(struct Motor_Struct* MS, int PWM){
00064         MS->Motor_SetPWM(MS,PWM);
00065         return ;
00066 }

00080 void Motor_Set2103PWM(struct Motor_Struct* MS, int PWM){
00081         int data;
00082         int negative = 0;
00083         int i;
00084         if(PWM < 0){
00085                 PWM *= -1;
00086                 negative = 1;
00087                 }
00088         if(PWM > 1000)
00089                 PWM = 1000;
00090         
00091         if(negative == 1)
00092                 PWM |= 0x0800;
00093         data = ((MS->pwmChannel & 0x0F)<<12) | (PWM & 0x0FFF);
00094         SPI_SetLength(16);
00095         Mux_Set(&MBMux,MUX_2103);
00096         SPI_Send(data);
00097         Mux_Unset(&MBMux);
00098         for (i = 0; i < 6800; i++);
00099         if(negative == 1)
00100                 MS->currPWM = PWM * (-1);
00101         else
00102                 MS->currPWM = PWM;
00103         return ;
00104 }
00111 void Motor_SetOwnPWM(struct Motor_Struct* MS, int PWM){
00112         if(PWM < 0){
00113                 PWM *= -1;
00114                 GPIO_Set(MS->controlA,0);
00115                 GPIO_Set(MS->controlB,1);       
00116         } else {
00117                 GPIO_Set(MS->controlA,1);
00118                 GPIO_Set(MS->controlB,0);
00119         }
00120         PWM_Set(MS->pwmChannel,PWM);
00121         MS->currPWM = PWM;
00122         return ;
00123 }
